title: All That Glitters, featuring the cast of Story Pirates
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This Thai story starring Lee Overtree, Peter McNerney and Meghan O'Neill (hosts of Gimlet's Story Pirates podcast) shines a sparkling light on the treasures that come from honesty, integrity and honor.
